Command.Name: time
Command.Example: tell me the Time
Command.Feedback: Yes Time. I'll check it

Command.Name: date2
Command.Example: tell me the date
Command.Feedback: Yes Date! Just a second please

Command.Name: battery
Command.Example: tell me Battery
Command.Feedback: Yes Battery! Just a moment!

Command.Name: localWeather
Command.Example: tell me local weather on tommorw
Command.Feedback: Yes! local weather for {day}

Command.Name: currentLocalWeather
Command.Example: tell me about weather
Command.Feedback: Yes! current weather condition

Command.Name: weather
Command.Example: tell me about weather in Paris on Monday
Command.Feedback: aha! weather for {day} in {place}

Command.Name: currentWeather
Command.Example: tell me about weather in Paris
Command.Feedback: Yap! weather for {place}

Command.Name: appointments
Command.Example: tell me my next appointments
Command.Feedback: Yes, I'll check your appointments now

Command.Name: findAppointments
Command.Example: tell me when is Sara's birthday
Command.Feedback: Yes {appointment}. let me check

Command.Name: relativeAlarmTimeSetHourMinute
Command.Example: wake me up in 2 hour and 3 minutes
Command.Feedback: Sure! Setting the alarm clock for {number} hours and {number2} minutes

Command.Name: relativeAlarmTimeSetMinute
Command.Example: notify me in 40 minutes
Command.Feedback: Sure! Setting the alarm clock for {number2} minute

Command.Name: relativeAlarmTimeSetHour
Command.Example: alarm me in half an hour
Command.Feedback: Sure! Setting the alarm clock for {number} hour

Command.Name: actionReminder_contact_day_dayPart
Command.Example: remind me to call mom on tomorow afternoon
Command.Feedback: Sure! I'll remind you to {reminderAction} {contactLoos} on {day}

Command.Name: actionReminder_contact_date
Command.Example: remind me to call dad on January 1st afternoon
Command.Feedback: Sure! I'll remind you to {reminderAction} {contactLoos} on {month} {number}
